list.title: User Management

error.min: Ward number must be at least 1

emptyState.title: No Users Found
emptyState.description: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria

error.title: Error Loading Users
error.description: There was a problem loading the user list. Please try again.

create.title: Create New User

edit.title: {{email}}
edit.description: Update user information, permissions, and password settings

errors.userNotFound: User not found or you don't have permission to view this user

form.passwordRequirements: Password must contain at least one digit, one lowercase, one uppercase letter and one special character
form.isWardLevelUser: This is a ward level user.

errors.emailInvalid: Please provide a valid email address
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.passwordPattern: Password must contain at least one digit, lowercase, uppercase letter and special character
errors.rolesRequired: At least one role must be selected
errors.wardNumberRequired: Ward number is required for ward level users
errors.wardNumberRange: Ward number must be between 1 and 33

delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.

CREATE_USER.title: Create User
CREATE_USER.description: Can create new user accounts in the system

APPROVE_USER.title: Approve User
APPROVE_USER.description: Can approve and activate user accounts in the system

EDIT_USER.title: Edit User
EDIT_USER.description: Can modify existing user accounts in the system

DELETE_USER.title: Delete User
DELETE_USER.description: Can remove user accounts from the system

VIEW_USER.title: View User
VIEW_USER.description: Can view user account details in the system

RESET_USER_PASSWORD.title: Reset User Password
RESET_USER_PASSWORD.description: Can reset passwords for user accounts in the system

approve.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to approve this user? This action cannot be undone.
